entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:10 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:10 PM MST Monday 09 January 2023
